content.rendered:
YORK AVIATION | YORK AIRPORT

York Aviation at the York Airport is a privately-owned, public-use airport in York County in South Central Pennsylvania. We offer a variety of services and events to both pilots and members of the community alike. We invite you to take a look and learn more about what York Aviation and the surrounding communities offer.

In addition to providing public use of the airport runway, York Aviation also provides services for aircraft maintenance, Bonanza/Baron maintenance, fuel, aircraft cleaning, avionics, learn to fly, hangar leasing, Stat MedEvac, flying clubs, and ground transportation.

ADDRESS

6054 Lincoln Highway West,
Thomasville, PA 17362

Capabilities

VISIT SITE CONTACT US
